awards.name: President's Award
awards.description: The highest honor bestowed by GOAA, recognizing extraordinary and sustained service to the alumni association and the Gamma Omicron chapter.

awards.name: Outstanding Alumnus Award
awards.description: Recognizes an alumnus who has achieved distinction in their professional career and brought honor to the Pi Kappa Alpha name.

awards.name: Dave Ritchey Award
awards.description: Named for Brother Dave Ritchey '68, this award honors alumni who best embody the true spirit of brotherhood in their daily lives.

awards.name: Mert Simons Award
awards.description: Presented to an alumnus for exceptional and dedicated service to the Gamma Omicron Alumni Association over many years.

awards.name: Mom Heidler Award
awards.description: A unique honor recognizing women who have gone above and beyond in their dedication to the chapter and its members.

awards.name: Ron Schuff Pledge Award
awards.description: Given to the outstanding new member pledge class, recognizing academic achievement, brotherhood, and leadership potential.
